public value class SqlMoney : IComparable, System::Data::SqlTypes::INullable, System::Xml::Serialization::IXmlSerializable

span.span: Represents a currency value ranging from -2 63 (or -922,337,203,685,477.5808) to 2 63 -1 (or +922,337,203,685,477.5807) with an accuracy to a ten-thousandth of currency unit to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
